item.description:
Let's bike on Ocean Drive (12 to 15 miles or so)!

THIS WILL BE AROUND A 70% FASTER PACE THAN OUR PREVIOUS RIDES. WE WILL PROBABLY MAKE ONE STOP IN THE MIDDLE FOR A WATER BREAK.

I'm guess we'll be going at 12-13 miles per hour...

Meet us at the parking lot in the front of Fort Adams (near the food vendors to the right) at 9am on Sunday, August 30th.

We're going to be riding on the roads. That means cars - not a whole lot, but some. For this reason, we recommend that you bring a helmet.

Other things you should bring include:

a) A bicycle
b) Lots of water
c) Sunglasses!! Very important as it will be very sunny!

We're going to be traveling at a decent speed - you don't have to be a professional athlete to keep up, but we won't be going at a snail's pace either.

This will be a joint meetup between the Newport Friends and Providence bicycling meetup

Any questions? Feel free to message me.
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red road bike. Try my cell: 401-699-7304.
item.name: Newport's Ocean Drive - **Faster Pace** 12 or 13 mph
